Vodacom phone numbers start with 07. Halotel phone numbers start with 06.

Complete the Python function count_voda_halotel_numbers so that it correctly counts the number of Vodacom phone numbers and the number of Halotel numbers in any phone_numbers list given to it. You will need to check the first two digits of every phone number; for example
column3: if you have a variable called phone_number
column4: you can get just the first two digits using: $$phone\_number[\text{:2}]$$ Use this inside an if block to check if the first two digits of a phone number are '06' or '07'. count_voda_halotel_numbers phone_numbers num_voda 0 num_halotel 0 num_voda
